Package com.i2group.apollo.auditservice

The Intelligence Analysis Platform audit service provides clients with the ability to retrieve audit information about changes to items in the Analysis Repository.

Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAuditService A method for retrieving AuditEntrys about items in the Analysis Repository.
 

Package com.i2group.apollo.auditservice Description

The Intelligence Analysis Platform audit service provides clients with the ability to retrieve audit information about changes to items in the Analysis Repository.

Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in.

The audit service presents a simple interface to clients. It contains a single method.

Web methodDescription
RetrieveAuditEntries Retrieves all of the entries in the audit store that were created between two specified times.

The results returned to the client are restricted to those entries affecting items that the user is permitted to see.

Since:
2.0
